name: Lifty Solutions
description: We are Lifty, partnering with software companies, including ERPs and other enterprises, to provide a white-label messaging solution. Our technology seamlessly integrates into existing systems, offering scalable, customizable, and AI-powered messaging capabilities. This allows our partners to deliver cutting-edge communication tools under their own brand, enhancing business communication, fostering growth, generating new revenue streams, and improving customer retention.
focus_areas: Sales and Lead Qualification using AI
